header.title: Create modules thinking about the future
header.subtitle: The only framework compatible with all JavaScript environments.

whatIs.title: Why choose BeyondJS
whatIs.what: BeyondJS is a meta-framework that provides a Dev Server for development and a CDN in production, to consume modules from any execution environment directly.

whatsIsItFor.title:
Module-based programming
based on universal packages

features.title: Libraries and packages
features.description: That are expected to be consumed by other development teams.

features.title: Widgets
features.description: With rendering on the server, on the client or hybrid in each component.

universalDevelopment.title: Universal Development
universalDevelopment.subTitle: The same experience for all
universalDevelopment.concept: Same code base, same development experience, and with a low learning curve. Bring the web development experience to all areas where JavaScript has reach.

doYouWantMore.preTitle: Do you want to know more?
doYouWantMore.title:
More than a Framework,
it's BeyondJS

features.title: Unification
features.description: Allows consuming packages from any environment.

features.title: Typescript First
features.description: Enables automatic generation of types ( .d.ts files) and performs optimized type checking without the need for configuration.

features.title: Deployment
features.description: Features BeyondJS Workspace which manages dependency management, deployment process, and error management.

features.title: HMR
features.description: Is automatically integrated for Frontend and Backend.

features.title: Web Socket
features.description: Is fully ready to use with type generation for frontend-backend interaction code.

features.title: Standard ESM
features.description: Allows modular development based on ES Modules, with automatic generation of importmaps and SystemJS for browser projects.

features.title: Everything you need
features.description: BeyondJS is everything you need: CSS, SASS, VUE, REACT, SVELTE are compatible with each other and naturally.

features.title: Standard NPM
features.description: Has an npm package optimization that eradicates “dependency hell” and ensures compatibility with different ways of consuming packages.

features.title: Ready for the future
features.description: Is designed to add emerging technologies and libraries.

codepen.title: Widgets out-of-the-box
codepen.subTitle: Ready to use
codepen.description: We integrate a React on-demand loading widget that initially renders with SSR and allows you to instantly change rendering types (inspect it).
